short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Excludes Reddit results from Google search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Exclude Google Search Results from reddit.com with one click. This extension uses Google Search Operators commands to filter out all results from reddit.com. You are able to enable and disable this extension by clicking the extension icon.
